minions.name: Cyberback
minions.description: Ongoing: You may play actions onto this minion from your discard pile instead of from your hand

minions.name: Clyde 2.0
minions.description: Ongoing: If your actions played on minions here go to the discard pile, you may place them into your hand instead

minions.name: Baboom
minions.description: Talent: Play an action on this minion as an extra action

minions.name: Furious George
minions.description: Ongoing: Has +1 power for each action played on it

actions.name: Cyberevolution
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +3 power

actions.name: Flying Monkey
actions.description: Play on a minion. Special: After this base scores, you may move this minion to another base instead of the discard pile. Destroy this action

actions.name: Going Bananas
actions.description: Choose a base. Destroy other players' actions played on that base and on minions there

actions.name: Juiced Up
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion has +2 power for each action on it (including this one)

actions.name: Missing Uplink
actions.description: Play on your minion. Ongoing: Draw an additional card at the end of your turn

actions.name: Monkey on Your Back
actions.description: Play on your minion. Talent: Destroy another player's minion here of power 4 or less. Place this card on the bottom of your deck

actions.name: Monkey See, Monkey Do
actions.description: Reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Place any number of actions revealed into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck

actions.name: Shielding
actions.description: Play on a minion. Ongoing: This minion and other actions on it are not affected by other players' actions
